Subject: WeightLifting
data: 1 Who was the first Indian woman to win an Olympic medal? A Karnam Malleswari B Mary Kom C Saina Nehwal D K Sanjita Chanu Answer: Option [A]
2 Name the Indian woman, who won a gold medal in Commonwealth Games, Glasgow. A Mirabai Saikhom Chanu B S Sunaina C Sanjita Khumukcham Chanu D Pratima Kumari Answer: Option [C]
3 Where is the Headquarters of Indian Weighlifting Federation located? A Mumbai B Hyderabad C New Delhi D Kanpur Answer: Option [C]
4 Where is the Headquarters of International Weighlifting Federation located? A Budapest B New York C Geneva D Toronto Answer: Option [A]
5 In which year International Weightlifting Federation founded? A 1902 B 1905 C 1909 D 1910 Answer: Option [B]
